Package edu.ua.cs.cs200.project4

Class ProviderRecords

java.lang.Object
edu.ua.cs.cs200.project4.ProviderRecords
public class ProviderRecords extends Object
Manages the records of ChocAn service providers. This class handles the addition, removal, retrieval, and listing of providers. Providers are loaded from and saved to a file on initialization and modification. The default file location for providers is "src/providers.txt".
Author:
dddierking

      public Provider getProvider(int providerID)
      Retrieves a provider based on the provided providerID.
      Parameters:
      providerID - The unique identifier of the provider.
      Returns:
